title: APEI Appoints James Kenigsberg as Interim Chief Innovation and Technology Officer
description: CHARLES TOWN, W.Va., Aug. 11, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- American Public Education, Inc. (Nasdaq: APEI) announced the appointment of James Kenigsberg as its interim Chief Innovation and Technology Officer, a pivotal leadership role as the organization accelerates its transition to become a data-first, AI-enabled institution. With a mission rooted in serving military, nursing, and other service-minded learners, APEI is investing in intelligent infrastructure, predictive analytics, and personalized digital tools to modernize every part of the learner journey. This transformation aims to improve access, improve student persistence, and deliver more responsive, mission-aligned educational experiences across American Public University System (APUS), Rasmussen University, and Hondros College of Nursing.
